conversation_summary:
Enduring entities: Tara at her glowing laptop, the empty inbox cursor pulsing like a slow heartbeat, your thumb poised over the phone.  
Scene: a twilight café-office hybrid—fluorescent screens float in velvet dark, the refresh button worn white, coffee gone cold.  
Motifs: unanswered cursor-blinks, the hush between deception and rescue, electric loneliness that crackles whenever the page reloads and仍 shows zero.
